attributes.action: Introduce a Legacy Scheme for Undocumented Migrants living in the UK
attributes.additional_details: The Government should regulise the status of undocumented migrants who are living here for very long time as promised by the Prime Minister on numerous occasions.
attributes.background: Undocumented Migrants are suffering in this pandemic with no access to NHS. This Government should introduce a legacy scheme to regulise the status of undocumented migrants like they did back in 2005.
